turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: HI, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what type of coffee would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a grande, non-fat, caramel macchiato with extra caramel sauce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me place that order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have a grande, caramel macchiato with extra caramel sauce and non-fat milk to be picked up at starbucks in daly city, ca, westlake shopping center.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to order anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you.
